scripts.reload-engine: copy ..\engine\dist\game-engine-* .\ && npm uninstall game-engine && npm install game-engine-0.1.32.tgz
scripts.reload-packager: copy ..\game-engine-packager\game-engine-packager-* .\ && npm uninstall game-engine-packager && npm install --save-dev game-engine-packager-0.0.3.tgz
scripts.full-webpack: npm run tsc-web && npm run build-webpack
scripts.full-electron: npm run full-webpack && npm run build-electron
